item.title: Using GitHub Actions to set up workflow
item.description: In Software Development Lifecycle(SDL), we need a workflow to build, test, package and deliver our projects to a certain platform. Github Actions provides a solution to define that workflow in the repository itself by a yaml file. What is github action Github action is the smallest execution unit to compose a workflow. There are 2 types of github action according to how it is implemented: JavaScript action

item.title: About me
item.description:
About Me I am an open source software engineer I work for Red Hat I work on WildFly and its components. I work on Vert.x community mainly focus on vertx-mail-client component
Software is always full of magic, I want to be one of the best players. — Lin Gao Never give up
